def_cn: （自行车或摩托车后轮两侧的）挂包，挂篮，挂篓
def_en: A pannier is one of two bags or boxes for carrying things in, which are fixed on each side of the back wheel of a bicycle or motorbike.

def_cn: （通常挂在驮兽两侧的）驮篮，驮篓，驮包
def_en: A pannier is a large basket or bag, usually one of two that are put over an animal and used for carrying loads.
